name: Eldritch Dagger
description: A dagger that whispers maddening secrets to its wielder.

name: Tentacle Whip
description: A whip made from the living tentacle of an ancient being.

name: Cursed Tome
description: A book filled with forbidden knowledge that drains the life of those who read it.

name: Starlight Blade
description: A sword forged from the heart of a dead star, its edge glows with a cold light.

name: Void Staff
description: A staff that can summon the darkness between the stars to consume enemies.

name: Mindflayer's Gauntlet
description: A gauntlet that channels psychic energy to crush the minds of foes.

name: The Black Blade
description: A legendary sword said to be cursed by an ancient cosmic entity.

name: Abyssal Axe
description: An axe that resonates with the screams of the damned.

name: Shattered Mirror Shield
description: A shield made from shards of a mirror that once showed the true form of an eldritch god.

name: Whispering Spear
description: A spear that mutters the names of its next victims in the wielder's ear.

name: Blasphemous Blade
description: A sword forged in the fires of a forgotten hell, cursed to drink the blood of the innocent.

name: Gaze of the Abyss
description: A staff with an eye at its tip, gazing into it reveals truths that can shatter minds.

name: Warped Scythe
description: A scythe that distorts reality around it, making it difficult to predict its movements.

name: Chained Horror
description: A flail with chains that writhe as if alive, embedding fear in the hearts of those it strikes.

name: Necrotic Claw
description: A claw weapon that drains the life force of its victims, leaving them withered husks.

name: Phantom Lantern
description: A lantern that burns with an eerie light, its flames consuming the souls of the damned.

name: Ethereal Bow
description: A bow that fires arrows of pure energy, each shot tears through the fabric of reality.

name: Obsidian Mace
description: A mace carved from the black stone of an ancient monolith, it carries a weight of despair.

name: Void Razor
description: A razor-sharp blade that can cut through the very essence of a being, leaving no trace behind.

name: Haunted Warhammer
description: A warhammer haunted by the spirits of those it has slain, their wails echo with each strike.
